definition: proton (positively charged nuclear particle)/a prince sent to be held as a hostage in a neighbouring state in ancient China

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: When a proton recaptures an electron, red light is frequently emitted.
sentences.chinese: 當一個質子再度捕捉到電子時，常常會輻射出紅光。

sentences.english: The antibacterial ability of chitosan to E. coli was related to the protonation of amino group.
sentences.chinese: 殼聚糖對大腸桿菌的抑菌作用與其氨基的質子化有關。

sentences.english: Amines other than pyridines have been successfully employed as a proton sponge.
sentences.chinese: 用胺作爲質子吸收體代替吡啶還是得到同樣的結果。

sentences.english: A simple method for the estimation of the transverse shielding for intense- beam proton linac was described briefly.
sentences.chinese: 敘述了估算強流質子直線加速器橫向屏蔽的方法。

sentences.english: When alkali is added to such compounds a series of proton dissociations occurs.
sentences.chinese: 當堿加到這類化合物中，將發生一系列質子離解作用。

sentences.english: But, I've got a nucleus with 11 protons in it.
sentences.chinese: 但是我知道它的原子核中有11個質子。

sentences.english: Proton and neutron form a charge doublet .
sentences.chinese: 質子和中子構成電荷雙重態。

sentences.english: Structures of pyridine clusters and mechanism of intracluster proton transfer are presented.
sentences.chinese: 給出了吡啶團簇的穩定結構和簇內的質子轉移過程。

sentences.english: Proton pump inhibitors can tackle really stubborn heartburn.
sentences.chinese: 質子泵抑制劑可以治療頑固性胃灼熱。

sentences.english: They believe that the charge carrier is protonic.
sentences.chinese: 他們相信電荷載體是質子。

sentences.english: The proton number is in the lower left corner.
Roughly equal in mass to that of the proton.
His research team discovered the antiproton.
sentences.chinese: 他的研究組發現了反質子。

sentences.english: An atom normally contains equal numbers of electrons and protons .
sentences.chinese: 原子在正常情況下含有數目相等的電子和質子。

sentences.english: With six protons and six neutrons, carbon normally has an atomic number of 12.
sentences.chinese: 具備6個質子和6箇中子，碳原子數通常爲12。
